item.title: Blog Setup: Hugo + GitHub Pages
item.description: https://gohugo.io/hosting-and-deployment/hosting-on-github/ https://docs.github.com/en/pages/getting-started-with-github-pages/about-github-pages#user--organization-pages 1. Setup github page: project. https://androchentw.github.io/blog-hugo cd ~/dev git clone https://github.com/androchentw/blog-hugo.git 2. Install Hugo https://gohugo.io/getting-started/quick-start/ brew install hugo hugo new site blog-hugo cd blog-hugo git submodule add https://github.com/luizdepra/hugo-coder.git themes/hugo-coder # git submodule add https://github.com/luizdepra/hugo-coder.git themes/beautifulhugo hugo new posts/hello_world.md # to preview hugo server -D # to build static page hugo -D 3. Keep Setup GitHub Page & GitHub Action https://gohugo.io/hosting-and-deployment/hosting-on-github/ git checkout --orphan gh-pages # https://github.
